title: Area between blue flood line and red flood line shall be restrictive zone for the purposes of construction
clause_text: Area between blue flood line and red flood line shall be restrictive zone for the purposes of construction. The construction within this area may be permitted at a height of 0.45 m. above the red flood line level.
section: Construction within Blue and Red Flood Line

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
